website_summaries.verdict: Illuminate your entire grilling surface as well as your grill knobs with the authentic Grilluminator light.
pros: 100 lumen output lights your entire grill and knobs without shadows
Adjustable 180° both horizontally and vertically, although range is somewhat limited by mounting
cons: If bumped, it can turn on inside the grill and drain the battery

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag
customer_reviews.text: Positives: the light is nice and bright, installation is a breeze and batteries were included in the package Negatives: the light protrudes so far it’s hitting the grill (Weber Genesis) anytime the lid is closed needing readjustment every time. It also doesn’t turn off automatically on closing the lid requiring the it to be turned on / turned off every time. Basically it’s a glorified flashlight that can attach to grill handle, that’s all.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father and he loves it. It does a fantastic job. Also worth mentioning, the customer service seems exceptional. We have not had any problems so we haven't had to contact anyone, but I received an email right after ordering from the company laying out the guidelines if I needed a return/ exchange. Apparently, it is 100% guarantee or your money back (plus the letter they sent was very funny which made them seem like a fun company!) Then they sent another follow-up email to make sure I was happy. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased, but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the solution I was looking for, and I am delighted. Only tiny beef is that I have to swivel it out of the way each time I lower the lid as it would otherwise slam against the bottom of the grill. No big problem, the light is so efficient and effective, I will keep it, but just remember to swivel. Easy move, even with an elbow when hands are full.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: This is the best grill light!
customer_reviews.text: This grill light has been a godsend. We grill all seasons, including during the snowy winter months. This is actually our second purchase of this same light as our grill caught fire and melted the first one! We were shocked that it was actually still working, even in it's melted state! Decided to put it to rest though and purchase a new one! :)
customer_reviews.author: H. G.

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my dad because he's so picky & hate gadgets. But he thought this was great & ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a little worried when I bought this for my dad because he's so picky & hate gadgets. But he thought this was great & uses is all the time!! He used to complain when my mom would have dinner so late & he had to grill in the dark.....but says this light works perfectly & they are both happy now!! Very bright & also small enough where it doesn't get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: D. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Good light but unusable.
customer_reviews.text: The light works great. It's very bright. Unfortunately the piece that is tightened down to grip the grill handle is missing. This makes the light unusable without a different way to secure the light to the handle. I did buy a returned item but the description stated the light was only missing batteries. I expected to be able to use the light after adding batteries.
customer_reviews.author: JoMike

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what is claims and very well. They also write the best follow-up satisfaction letter! The light is bright, attaches easily and securely to the grille handle, and moves nicely to aim for use or to just get out of the way when the lid closes when not being used. It takes a moment to realize the power on/off is just a touch surface and not a "click" button, but then it's all very easy to use and benefit from. It's not water proof, but the easy fit allows it to be protected by our grille cover.
customer_reviews.author: Sportstick

customer_reviews.title: Great grilling lamp
customer_reviews.text: I have had this light for a few months now and really like it a lot. It illuminates the grill very well, and it is very adjustable. I use this on my large Big Green Egg - it attaches to the handle quite nicely, and it is easy to remove after the grill is cleaned up. I do not keep the light attached to the grill full time - only when I am grilling - so the ease of attachment and removal is very important to me.
customer_reviews.author: lt

customer_reviews.title: A really good product
customer_reviews.text: Received my BBQ light last night. Figured out the batteries, door, touch switch, etc. (I hate reading instructions). It was really easy. and I'm amazed at the amount of light it produces - even more by the wide area that is lit up. I have a really nice Weber grill, and originally bought a Weber light. The Weber light did not light up the entire grill, and only lasted a couple of seasons. It's rainy and cold here right now, but I'm looking forward to some night time grilling just so I can use my new light. > > Thanks for making what appears to be a great product, and for your excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Big Wave Dave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product - Awesome Company
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light and lights up your grill really well. What's even better is the customer service and Lifetime warranty. I inadvertently left mine out in a pretty heavy rain and it quit. All it took was a simple email and a replacement was on it's way. It seems to be "new and improved" over my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Hashim

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit Weber Spirit 300 (very popular gas grill). The poor power button design caused repeated on and off cycles despite not touching the on/off button (Gremlins?). Batteries died since it would turn on all by itself. Tried to return it, but outside the window. Did not last one BBQ season.
customer_reviews.author: Bill The Bob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you do not have outside lighting
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad for Christmas. He has a Green Egg grill and unless you turn on the entire patio lighting, there is not light over near his grill. This was perfect to connect to the handle and he uses it every time he grills at night! Awesome product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great find that does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these grill lights as I thought one wouldn't be bright enough as my previous grill light from other manufacturers were dim and didn't light up the BBQ. I used them today for the first time and they are incredible, one is more than enough to light up the entire grill. Easy to use and brightness was incredible. Buying them sight unseen, i wasn't sure, but these turned out to be a great little gem. I would highly recommend these lights to anyone who grills in the evening or winter months and needs to see what they are cooking. These lights have surpassed my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Mark K

customer_reviews.title: The mount doesn't have a very long reach.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on my Traeger grill. The light itself works great. Very bright. I only have two issues with this light. 1. The on/off switch is very sensitive. Just brushing it with your finger turns it on or off. 2. It will not work on my Traeger. It mounts to handle very solidly. However, it is too short to illuminate the grill surface. The handle of my grill is set too far up the grill lid for the mount to work properly. Unfortunately for me. I purchased it and went out of town for a month. I missed the return window. So now I have a $30 grill light that is of no use to me.
customer_reviews.author: Nextlevel

customer_reviews.title: Need a light?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my daughter. She does a lot of craft work and sometimes needs extra light for closeup work. She says it works great and stays on her head without slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Alice R.

customer_reviews.title: Light and functionable
customer_reviews.text: The jury is still out. Not really sure about the durability of this devise. It is however a very nice lite for the grill. Can't attach the lite to my grill unless I want to leave it out in the elements. I could mount it every time I want to grill but that's ridiculous I say. That I don't suggest you do. I am going to look around the house for something that I can use to help in regards to mounting this inside the hood but away from heart and flames.... Will See. If I come up with a better plan I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: It's just "OK." If you want the light to shine on the actual grilling surface you have to mount the light to the handle in such a way that you can't close the lid of the grill without moving the light. The clamp would be ok if it were permanently attached, but you are not supposed to leave it on the grill outside when not in use and the small thumb screw is not conducive to tightening and loosening over and over again. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: to big to close lid
customer_reviews.text: This product it to big to close the lid. one light turns on by itself. I have already replaced the batteries because it always on. the rotation of the doesn't allow it to rotate enough or the correct way to all the lid to close. it only rotates 360 and up and down. it's not full motion. therefore because of the mounting design you are stuck. Shame cause the light is bright. just to big and looks odd. not an enhancement. I already took them off.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Does the job very well.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install (and remove). Good lighting covering the whole grill area. I screw it on when needed and remove it after use, so easy. Don't leave it outside on the grill when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Alpha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: He loved it. Clipped it on right away and started using it. No more complaining about not being able to see inside the grill at night.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with my new light
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my new light. Just as advertised it is bright and I can see exactly what I'm cooking! The light covers the whole grill area and there's no more bringing the food in because we think it's done only to find out it's still raw in the middle. Thank you so much for a great product. I will be recommending this to all my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase but a little pricey.
customer_reviews.text: The ease of the on-off touch button is great, but sometimes it is so sensitive that the light is turned on and off accidentally. This can lead to it being left on and burning out battery life. Otherwise, the LED lights are very bright and cover the full range of the cooking surface on the grill. I have also found other household uses for it due to its portability and flexibility. Since purchasing, however, I have seen other similar products that cost a lot less and seem to function the same. Shop around before committing to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dazzle

customer_reviews.title: So Sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light , but it turns on with the slightest touch. I pulled the cover over the grill and it inadvertently brushed the light. The light was on for almost a day and half until the batteries died. Maybe next time design the the button to activate with a touch and hold, not just swipe. Just a thought! I still recommend it for all night grillers, like me.
customer_reviews.author: Corinthian

customer_reviews.title: Dont let it get wet
customer_reviews.text: I left my grill cover off and it got wet and would not function. I dried it out and it worked until it got wet a second time, then it would not work at all. You would think a grill light could be out in the rain, but not this one, don't get it wet. It went in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: bethany66

customer_reviews.title: Solved Our Dark Porch Problem
customer_reviews.text: Our grill is on a covered porch and at night it is very hard to see what's happening on the grill. No more rushing to get something cooked before the sun goes down. The light lights up the entire grilling surface perfectly. We have a Wilmington Grill, the light fits the handle perfectly. Since our grill is not out in the weather we just leave the light in place year round. No problems - works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: TXnNC

customer_reviews.title: I love this light
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I love this light! I would recommend this to anyone who grills in the evening or at night. It shines a bright light on the entire grill surface when the lid is raised! The customer service with this company is also great. I am very glad I purchased this light. I will probably buy more for my grilling friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kyrutter

customer_reviews.title: Great light but could be better with some "ease of use" improvements
customer_reviews.text: It has a wide range of light and rotates easily into the position you want to set it in. Then it stays there well. Relatively easy to attach to the grill handle. Would rate it a 5 if there was a better on/off switch. The touch button is very sensitive and so it's easy to accidentally turn it on while it's being stored and run the battery down. It would also be nice if they could put it in a weather proof casing so that it could be left on the grill when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Most sensitive power button on the planet
customer_reviews.text: The power button is activated if you breathe on the device. Basically it turns on as soon as any part of the light is touched. Forget about a grill cover. Waste of my time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Grill light
customer_reviews.text: Works great although it is not as bright as I would have liked it but overall doing the job
customer_reviews.author: mrsstar3

customer_reviews.title: Why haven't i had one of these before.. awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Better than i even expected. Shipped super fast. Extremely happy with this purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen roberts

customer_reviews.title: Case is slowly melting...
customer_reviews.text: Great little light, but it's starting to melt. Only had it a few weeks unfortunately. I'd say it'll last a few more, then I'll have to find a better option. Won't buy this one again though...
customer_reviews.author: Brian Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Good idea
customer_reviews.text: Slick little unit. I have been trying for some time to find a light I could use on a stainless steel grill without drilling holes in the grill. This is it. A little cumbersome with it mounted on the grill handle and the need to flip it up and down when you open and close the grill but I am getting use to that. The light switch is sensitive but has not been an issue as others have. Suggested. Provides great light over the entire grilling surface.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I wish your company was in the business of selling all kinds of stuff, great customer service! I installed the light yesterday on my grill and today it's raining, no worries the cover is on the grill :-) The on off button works great you barely have to touch it. So far so good. Nice doing business with you guys.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Light
customer_reviews.text: Great grill light . Easy to install and gives plenty of light with a simple touch
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Maille

customer_reviews.title: Light appears very solid and I’m glad we did not buy one of the cheaper imitations
customer_reviews.text: The light was much easier to install than our former Weber light that also did not last very long. Also much brighter light that covers the entire grill. Still need to get used to having to move light after opening and closing the lid but I’m certain that will become second nature after more use and we do grill year round 4-5 times a week. Light appears very solid and I’m glad we did not buy one of the cheaper imitations.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S.

customer_reviews.title: ... for the first time this weekend and it was awesome! Easy to put the batteries in (they even ...
customer_reviews.text: We hooked it up and used it for the first time this weekend and it was awesome! Easy to put the batteries in (they even send you a screwdriver to do it!) and then i loved the touch of the light switch. It illuminated our grill perfectly! Thank you so much, we will be now looking forward to grilling in the dark!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela G

customer_reviews.title: I discovered other uses for the light!
customer_reviews.text: I got my order yesterday from your company. I’m extremely happy with the service and communication. While I haven’t used the light as yet for my Weber BBQ, I did use it this past weekend in the house as I was painting a dark hallway and the color difference from old to new was very subtle. The bright BBQ light was a perfect aid in allowing me to see the color difference very distinctly. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Mercier

customer_reviews.title: I can't describe how happy I am that the product actually worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son-in-law for his birthday, and he has confirmed (through my daughter, who holds the official bulls*** meter) that he really likes this product. He's very into grilling, and at this time of year he just couldn't see what was on the grill previously. I can't describe how happy I am that the product actually worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: HannahB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, bright light
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, bright light, easy to turn on (or off) with just a tap to the on button, easy to install, easy to adjust, clips on handle, easy to remove for storage between uses, out of the weather. Don't forget to buy batteries. Husband loves it.
customer_reviews.author: nennasays -

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: This light worked great when it worked. The power button just stopped one day, and I've tried to contact the company by phone and email to try and take advantage of the warranty, but their customer service seems to be non existent.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: nice light very bright and works like i wanted it ...
customer_reviews.text: nice light very bright and works like i wanted it too. I feel that the very sensitive touch button is a little much, cant move it at all without it going on or off. Fits the grill very nice
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Stripped, had to return.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the light that cost the most as it was going to be a gift and I wanted the best. The one I got had the attachment screw stripped out. I am returning it and bought a different style light for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very happy with this present. He finally has light by grilling outside! Great product! One is sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Dim, very dim upon second use
customer_reviews.text: It worked well one time then seem to be like super dim the next night. That kind of sucks if that's as long as the batteries last. Now I will have to get new batteries and see if that's the problem .
customer_reviews.author: joe v.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit Pitt Boss Classic 700
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Pitt Boss Classic 700. It really does not fit it. Apparently the Pitt Boss handle is too far away from the edge. So the light doesn't extend far enough to go around the edge of the top and shine down. If you lift the lid, the light shines right in your face (see pic). Not on the grill. I'm going to return light seems decent but it just doesn't seem to fit. If I still have to hold a flashlight in my mouth then = not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzycajun

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product!!
customer_reviews.text: After being at a good friends house seeing him struggle trying to cook at night I went on the search for a really good grill light. Like many people I followed the reviews and after reading through many I decided on this one. I gave to my friend and they have been using it like crazy! It connected perfectly to the handle of the grill and give excellent lighting to not only the cooking surface but both side tables as well. I would recommend this to anybody! Thank you for a GREAT product!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Muto

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived and with batteries installed, Attached the light to my grill and now the light comes on automatically draining the batteries This has happened on several occasions
customer_reviews.author: kenneth jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product and gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: As time changes, darkness varies throughout the year and makes grilling in the evening challenging sometimes. I purchased this for my husband and he just loves it!! The grill light attaches easily to the grill hood and adjusts according to chefs needs. It's bright LED light guarantees perfect grilling every time!! Great product-well made!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Setter

customer_reviews.title: Its is easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Aloha To The Grillinator Boys! The Grilluminator Grill Light is a big hit!! Its is easy to install, so easy to turn on and off. The best is that it lights up our entire grill. We grill year round here in New England and this is a much welcomed additon to our grill. Thank you, Jd
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bbq
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with this product, the light it’s very bright. I really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jose r amaral

customer_reviews.title: Wasted $$$
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my parents for Christmas and they couldn't figure it out. It was too difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Grilluminator-Another Use !
customer_reviews.text: The Grillinator Light is perfect for the barbeque. However I didn't use it on my grill. I attached it to my wheelchair and it works perfectly. It puts out a nice long wide light beam. I love it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: but better then grilling in the
customer_reviews.text: Lights up my grill..... kind of a pain to take on and off.... but better then grilling in the dark
customer_reviews.author: Todd L

customer_reviews.title: Was blind now i see.
customer_reviews.text: Wow what an amazing product. I used to turn my grill to get some light on my food in the dark, that was a pain. I used my flash light by putting it to. The side did the job but would have to pick it up to get an overview of my food. But no longer this Grilluminator Is the bomb, very bright LED, and it lights up my entire grill. Great product
customer_reviews.author: gamefan

customer_reviews.title: Love this light
customer_reviews.text: Great item and great vendor. Arrived exactly as described. Perfect light for grilling at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Contrucci

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this light on his grill. He ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this light on his grill. He is able to see clearly at night while he is grilling.
customer_reviews.author: punkinpatch

customer_reviews.title: Unit stopped working within a month
customer_reviews.text: Worked for one week, then when I came back to use it a month later it would not turn on, even though unit was turned off while not in use. The screw for batteries was so soft after the one use of installing the batteries it was not able to be opened even though I used the appropriate sized screw driver. So it is gonig in the trash since now I cant return it.
customer_reviews.author: Picky

customer_reviews.title: WELL WORTH IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Truly lives up to what is on the video. I cooked a Boston Butt on my smoker for 12 hrs during the night, so it worked flawlessly.I used it from lighting the grill, checking the meat, to pulling it off. I HIGHLY recommend it. A GREAT Christmas present!!!!!! Are there others out there that work as well, I can't answer that, but I KNOW this one is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mincey

customer_reviews.title: Great light.
customer_reviews.text: Great light...only issue is screwing and unscrewing the attachment to the grill handle. It proves a bit cumbersome as my climate won't allow for me to leave the light attached to the grill (nor is it recommended to do so by Grilluminator). Some sort of "quick" clamp would be awesome, but I certainly don't have a great idea for this fix, so it is what it is. Really a very nice light and a dedicated customer service staff...for sure! Thanks Torie!
customer_reviews.author: Robert DeMent

customer_reviews.title: Waist of money
customer_reviews.text: These things are the worst! I bought two of them they both melted on the first use with the grill on low. They constantly turn on and off because of the sensitivity of the tap switch. They are a one and done product. Don’t waist your money
customer_reviews.author: Paul Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Nice light for charcoal Weber kettle grill
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this product. We have a Weber charcoal kettle grill. He clips it to a handle and it works well. We grill often in the winter and it gets dark early so it's a big help.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce L. Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for use in the rain.
customer_reviews.text: It is supposed to be suitable for all kinds of weather. Left it on the barbecue during a downpour and when came back it was off. On furtrt inspection it was full of water.
customer_reviews.author: antanasvn

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even know a product like this existed......WOW !
customer_reviews.text: With all due respect to the "PRO" grillers out there.....your advantage has just been taken away. I have spent the last 20 years of my night grilling career either eating raw or burnt food....trying to position a flashlight or move the grill closer to the pinhole size beam of light that escapes my kitchen out to the deck. We must be sheltered here in upstate NY as nobody has ever heard of a "grill light"......GAME CHANGER !! This light was installed on my grill 3 minutes after it was delivered......easy peasy and end of story. Already ordered 6 more as 4th of July gifts to my besties !!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory H

customer_reviews.title: It's a great little LED light for the grill
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little LED light for the grill. Very bright when lighting the grill and the touch power button is a nice feature. I don't like that you need to screw/unscrew battery cover in place and the touch power that I liked didn't work too well with my grill cover (it turned the light on from the cover placement and drained the battery). Otherwise, no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Balch

customer_reviews.title: I cannot stress enough how important it is to have a full view without shadows to cook the perfect steak! I was blown away by th
customer_reviews.text: I have been grilling most of my life, but using this grill light the other night helped me create a 5 Star steak! I cannot stress enough how important it is to have a full view without shadows to cook the perfect steak! I was blown away by the amount of light it put out...not shadows on any part of the grill!!! I would highly recommend this for night cooking to impress the family and guests! Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this grill light.
customer_reviews.text: Every time you go to use this light, it’s too dim and needs new batteries. Super disappointed. Now I have to buy something else because this one jus hemorrhages money. Would not recommend. Spend a little more and get a brand you trust.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Battaglio

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it will work fine and is very bright
customer_reviews.text: Was not thinking when I ordered this as I have a coleman road trip grill and it does not have a round handle to mount it to. I made it work with a piece of PVC mounted to the grill. Looks like it will work fine and is very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill light.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grill light. The light is super bright and you barely have to touch it to turn it on. It was a bit more expensive then some of the others but they say there return policy is the best if anything goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Klintworth

customer_reviews.title: BUT NOT THE BEST MOUNTING BRACKET
customer_reviews.text: LIGHT IS BRITE, BUT NOT THE BEST MOUNTING BRACKET. DIFICULT STAYING TIGHT ON WEBER GRILL HANDLE.
customer_reviews.author: GNF

customer_reviews.title: Poor On/Off Switch Design
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but the on/off switch is so sensitive that it will turn on under the grille cover if anything touches or bumps it and drain the battery. The reply I received is that a new switch with with a light time out feature is in the works. Well, that does not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright light. Clamp could be redesigned.
customer_reviews.text: The light is nice and bright and allows me to see the entire grilling area. The on/off button is a nice feature but sensitive; I can see me accidentally touching it and draining the battery if not careful. The only thing I would recommend changing is the screw-type clamping system to a quick-release type. The current design doesn't make it convenient to remove the light after each use and the housing is not designed to withstand the elements (long term); I'm leaving mine attached all the time and covering the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Todd C.

customer_reviews.title: Not Weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: Not Weatherproof...Cant be left outside.. I left mine in the rain and it stopped working..Brought it in and dried it out (was holding water inside housing) ..replaced batteries and now it is working okay.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Great grill light
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband and he said it works great!! Loves the easy on/off. Nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: No workable power button
customer_reviews.text: I think somebody forgot to put an actual power button on it
customer_reviews.author: Tussle

customer_reviews.title: Junk light
customer_reviews.text: Light melted first time I attached it to overhead grill bar on my traeger. Light is 7" away from grill. Must be cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Liedorff

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Light!!
customer_reviews.text: This light is great! Excellent all the way around. I keep it attached the grill at all times (but under the grill cover). Super bright. I find that I only needed one for my 3 burner (unlike some of the other reviews stating more was needed). Thanks! A+++++++
customer_reviews.author: buzz

customer_reviews.title: Great grill light!
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Had bought one for my mom for xmas. She loves it. Worked so well and priced so reasonable, bought this second one on an impulse on our first night grilling with the neighbors since he didn't have a grill light and it was the start of grilling season. I don't talk grilling often but I always recommend this light.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT GIFT FOR THE HUBS
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! Bought the grilluminator for my hubby's birthday and he's pretty much obsessed with it! It was the perfect solution to our dark balcony in the city! My steak last night was cooked perfectly - thanks to you!! The only thing he was frustrated with was getting the battery compartment opened. I think he spent 20 min trying to find a screwdriver small enough to fit (then he asked for help and I had an eyeglass screwdriver that worked). But that's my only downside (and hardly a downside)!! Perfect gift which makes me the perfect wife! Thanks again for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Misko

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit on the grill handle and shine on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit on the grill handle and shine on the grill surface due to the juxtaposition of the handle. So I can't use it. Bright enough, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Tunamuffin

customer_reviews.title: This light attaches securely to the handle on my grill and provides good light. Recommend to anyone that grills after the ...
customer_reviews.text: I grill year round and when daylight savings time changes in Winter, it is always dark when I am grilling out. This light attaches securely to the handle on my grill and provides good light. Recommend to anyone that grills after the sun sets.
customer_reviews.author: LarryV

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding B-B-Q Illuminator
customer_reviews.text: Excellent illuminator for our bar-b-q. We'd been wondering what to get to light up our bar-b-q area and discovered this on Amazon. We're so glad we did, as this works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Nance

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good item as I received mine and returned the place ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good item as I received mine and returned the place where the switch was is solid plastic no way of even turning it on! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Mark Zuehlke

customer_reviews.title: It gives off sufficient light so that I can see what I'm doing though I would like it if it had a better clipping mechanism
customer_reviews.text: I got this to clip to my grill when I use it in the winter. It gives off sufficient light so that I can see what I'm doing though I would like it if it had a better clipping mechanism. Still, it does what I need it to do and was affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R. Turner

customer_reviews.title: I freaking love these fools
customer_reviews.text: These guys are legit. back their product, the shipping, the batteries, the smile on your face when opening the box, the euphoria felt in your SOUL knowing that you can see your meat after 5pm in the dead of winter... I MEAN EVERYTHING!!!! I freaking love this company.
customer_reviews.author: M. Spicer

customer_reviews.title: Gives good light when he grills
customer_reviews.text: Husband needed light on the grill. Fits onto handle of his grill and works perfectly for him. Gives good light when he grills.
customer_reviews.author: C - Mama Likes To Read Book Blog

customer_reviews.title: Insure sufficient space between Hood and Grilluminator to prevent heat melting Grillumnator
customer_reviews.text: Had to be very careful with on/off touch button to insure not accidentally not left on. Is there an automatic shutoff?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even greater Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: The Grilluminator is genius! Who hasn't tried to grill when it is dark outside and the patio lighting just isn't good enough? What was even more impressive was the customer service. Instant communication once you purchase the product, constant communication of when the product was packed and when it was shipped. It was at my doorstep within just a day or two minus the weekend of course. But I was extremely pleased with the efficient process and timely delivery of the product. I highly recommend the product to anyone who does any grilling whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: James Donald

customer_reviews.title: He liked it so much I bought it again this year ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of the grill lights last Christmas for my husband. He liked it so much I bought it again this year for a gift. The Grillinator guys really care about customer satisfaction. I love their sense of humor!
customer_reviews.author: Andria

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, looks to be a good solution
customer_reviews.text: I have attached but not used the product as of yet. Easy install, looks to be a good solution. Since original feedback I have used the light. Very effective.
customer_reviews.author: jeff olseth

customer_reviews.title: So far so good I bought this for my mama as a Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I bought this for my mama as a Christmas present and she was in love with it. She is the type that likes to grill at night always but uses her phone or an actual flashlight to cook with. I was surprised how durable it was.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany bond

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The grilluminator is a great addition to my Weber. This light meet all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Wiegand

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill light!
customer_reviews.text: Brightest grill light I've ever seen. Seems very sturdy. Works great so far. The real test is when I'm grilling out during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: j & j

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Got it today, used it tonight, Works as stated. Just got to remember not leave it out. Plenty of light to cook my famous........! Sending one to my brother in law.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: The good. Started good and very bright The bad
customer_reviews.text: The good. Started good and very bright The bad. Runs out of battery faster than batteries life And killing the battery the way it's hard to replace them And the parts inside battery compartment getting rusted and broke off Finally don't waste your money Gave it to start for the idea
customer_reviews.author: 1stname

customer_reviews.title: Great Grilling Light
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, adjusts to many angles, and easy to manage with the touch sensor feature!
customer_reviews.author: Yosef

customer_reviews.title: Good beam
customer_reviews.text: Time for nighttime grillin! Good quality, easy set up. Light just right for the night!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my daughter and son-in-law, and they love it. I'm happy I picked such a good gift. I picked it by reading the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: JudyK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grill light!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I ordered this light being a slight bit skeptical. I recieved it in the promised short time with my Prime membership and after opening and installing the batteries I was blown away at how bright and the wide spread of the light. I love it and I can say without hessitation that you will too.
customer_reviews.author: Cajunate

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice broad band of light. Much better than some of the others. Hooks on easily to handle. Gotta say the meat is coming out even better now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Grill Light
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed grilling at night for the first time. Light is nice and bright, just be mindful that power button is sensitive and can be turned on if your not noticing.
customer_reviews.author: Joselito

product_meta.title: Grillinator Authentic Grilluminator BBQ Grill Light-Ultra Bright Handle Mount LE, Black
feature_bullets: The Grilluminator BBQ Grill Light’s 100 Lumen output illuminates your entire grill + any control knobs, without shadows.
The versatile BBQ tool fits securely around your grill and only takes a few minutes to set up using the included micro screwdriver.
The 20,000 hour rated LEDs mean you can use your grill light every day without worrying about the life of the bulbs.
The durable, weather resistant light is the easiest way to ensure your food is cooked perfectly and your solution to grilling in the dark.
Take the Grilluminator with you on camping trips, cabin vacations or to tailgate parties.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars624 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
